console.log(id)} className="flex py-7 px-2 border-b cursor-pointer hover:shadow-lg pr-4 transition duration-200 ease-out first:border-t">

{title}

{bed} bed | {bedroom} bedrooms

GH₵ {newPrice} / year

) } export default InfoCard
